statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage
SELECT usage_date, num_of_uses FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage WHERE num_of_uses > 10
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type, usage_date, num_of_uses FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage ORDER BY num_of_uses DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage ORDER BY usage_date DESC, num_of_uses ASC
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage WHERE num_of_uses > 10
SELECT DISTINCT benefit_type FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage
SELECT * FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage WHERE benefit_type = 'Healthcare' AND usage_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS usage_count FROM EmployeeBenefitsUsage GROUP BY employee_id HAVING usage_count > 5 ORDER BY usage_count DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type FROM employee_benefits WHERE amount_used > 100;
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type, amount_used FROM employee_benefits WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT type_id, type_description FROM benefit_types;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount_used) AS total_amount_used FROM employee_benefits GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE amount_used > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount_used) AS total_amount_used FROM employee_benefits GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_amount_used > 500;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.benefit_type, b.type_description FROM employee_benefits AS e JOIN benefit_types AS b ON e.benefit_type = b.type_id;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS usage_count FROM employee_benefits GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY usage_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(benefit_type) AS unique_benefits FROM employee_benefits WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type FROM benefits WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount_used) AS total_usage FROM benefit_usage GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT e.name, b.benefit_type, bu.amount_used FROM employees e JOIN benefits b ON e.employee_id = b.employee_id JOIN benefit_usage bu ON e.employee_id = bu.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'Finance' AND bu.amount_used > 1000;

SELECT e.name, b.benefit_type, bu.usage_date FROM employees e JOIN benefits b ON e.employee_id = b.employee_id JOIN benefit_usage bu ON e.employee_id = bu.employee_id WHERE b.benefit_type = 'Health' ORDER BY bu.usage_date DESC;

SELECT e.name, b.benefit_type, COUNT(bu.usage_id) AS total_usage FROM employees e JOIN benefits b ON e.employee_id = b.employee_id JOIN benefit_usage bu ON e.employee_id = bu.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, b.benefit_type HAVING total_usage > 5 ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_details
SELECT full_name, department FROM employee_details ORDER BY department ASC
SELECT full_name, hire_date, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employee_details WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT employee_id, usage_amount FROM employee_benefits_usage ORDER BY usage_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits_usage
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employee_details
SELECT department_name, manager_name FROM department_details
SELECT benefit_name, description FROM benefit_types
SELECT employee_id, usage_date, usage_amount FROM employee_benefits_usage
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM benefits_usage GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT e.first_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_departments ed ON e.employee_id = ed.employee_id JOIN departments d ON ed.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT b.benefit_name, COUNT(b.employee_id) AS total_users FROM benefit_types b JOIN benefits_usage bu ON b.benefit_id = bu.benefit_id GROUP BY b.benefit_name;
SELECT * FROM benefits_usage WHERE amount_spent > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, benefit_type, amount_spent FROM benefits_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, b.benefit_name FROM employees e JOIN benefit_types b ON e.employee_id = b.benefit_id;
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(ed.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employee_departments ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id GROUP BY d.department_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, SUM(bu.amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM employees e JOIN benefits_usage bu ON e.employee_id = bu.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
